About Me

Concept artist focused on character, creature, and environment design.

Quick Info

Full Name Katelyn Lydia
Email hello@katelynlydia.com
Phone +1 (234) 567-890
Age 25

Skills

  • Concept Art
  • Character Design
  • Creature Design
  • Environment Design
  • Digital Painting
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
  • Procreate
  • Clip Studio Paint
  • ZBrush

About Me

I'm a concept artist with a love for building worldsâ€”characters, creatures, and environments that feel alive. I mix traditional thumbnails with digital paintovers to focus on storytelling and mood. Current tools: Procreate, Photoshop, Blender.

Resume

option.value: <svg width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 64 64" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <title>About Me</title> <!-- Person icon with simple, clean lines --> <circle cx="32" cy="20" r="8" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2.5" fill="none"/> <path d="M16 52c0-8.837 7.163-16 16-16s16 7.163 16 16" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2.5" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/> <!-- Heart accent --> <path d="M44 16c-2.5-2.5-6.5-2.5-9 0s-6.5-2.5-9 0c-2.5 2.5-2.5 6.5 0 9l9 9 9-9c2.5-2.5 2.5-6.5 0-9z" fill="#C6E88E" opacity="0.7"/> </svg>

option.value: <svg width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 64 64" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <title>Concept Art</title> <!-- Paintbrush --> <path d="M12 52l8-8 4 4-8 8-4-4z" fill="#C6E88E" opacity="0.7"/> <path d="M20 44l24-24" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <path d="M44 20l8-8" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <!-- Brush tip --> <ellipse cx="46" cy="18" rx="3" ry="6" transform="rotate(-45 46 18)" fill="#7A0E2B"/> <!-- Palette --> <path d="M32 48c-8 0-14-6-14-14 0-8 6-14 14-14 8 0 14 6 14 14-2 0-4 2-4 4s2 4 4 4c0 4-6 6-14 6z" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/> <!-- Paint dots --> <circle cx="28" cy="32" r="2" fill="#C6E88E"/> <circle cx="36" cy="28" r="2" fill="#EEDCA8"/> <circle cx="40" cy="36" r="2" fill="#7A0E2B"/> </svg>

option.value: <svg width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 64 64" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <title>Projects</title> <!-- Folder base --> <path d="M8 16h48v36a4 4 0 01-4 4H12a4 4 0 01-4-4V16z" fill="#EEDCA8" opacity="0.7"/> <path d="M8 16h48v36a4 4 0 01-4 4H12a4 4 0 01-4-4V16z" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/> <!-- Folder tab --> <path d="M8 16V12a4 4 0 014-4h8l4 4h28v4" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/> <!-- Project documents --> <rect x="16" y="28" width="12" height="16" rx="2" fill="#C6E88E" opacity="0.8"/> <rect x="32" y="24" width="12" height="20" rx="2" fill="#C6E88E"/> <rect x="48" y="32" width="4" height="12" rx="1" fill="#7A0E2B"/> <!-- Grid lines on documents --> <line x1="18" y1="32" x2="26" y2="32" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="1"/> <line x1="18" y1="36" x2="26" y2="36" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="1"/> <line x1="34" y1="28" x2="42" y2="28" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="1"/> <line x1="34" y1="32" x2="42" y2="32" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="1"/> </svg>

option.value: <svg width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 64 64" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> <title>Showreels</title> <!-- Film reel --> <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="20" fill="#EEDCA8" opacity="0.7"/> <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="20" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2.5" fill="none"/> <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="8" stroke="#3F6E3A" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/> <!-- Film holes --> <circle cx="20" cy="20" r="3" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <circle cx="44" cy="20" r="3" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <circle cx="44" cy="44" r="3" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <circle cx="20" cy="44" r="3" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <!-- Play button in center --> <path d="M28 24l12 8-12 8V24z" fill="#7A0E2B"/> <!-- Film strip accent --> <rect x="8" y="28" width="6" height="8" rx="1" fill="#C6E88E"/> <rect x="50" y="28" width="6" height="8" rx="1" fill="#C6E88E"/> <!-- Film perforations --> <rect x="9" y="30" width="1" height="1" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <rect x="9" y="33" width="1" height="1" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <rect x="54" y="30" width="1" height="1" fill="#3F6E3A"/> <rect x="54" y="33" width="1" height="1" fill="#3F6E3A"/> </svg>

updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
Katelyn Lydia
  • Home
  • Projects
  • About
  • Concept Art
  • Showreels

Concept Art

A collection of concept art pieces showcasing creative exploration across various projects. Each piece represents a unique approach to visual storytelling and design development.

Mystic Peaks

An atmospheric landscape concept exploring otherworldly terrain and dramatic lighting effects. This piece focuses on creating depth through layered mountains and mystical fog elements.

  • Year: 2025
  • Tools: Procreate / Photoshop
  • Dimensions: 3000 Ã— 2000 px

Neo-Tokyo Dreams

A cyberpunk-inspired urban environment showcasing advanced architecture and atmospheric lighting. The design emphasizes vertical scale and technological integration within city planning.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Blender / Photoshop
  • Dimensions: 4000 Ã— 2250 px

Forest Guardian

Character concept design for a nature-based fantasy setting. This piece explores organic forms, natural textures, and the integration of flora within character design elements.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Procreate / Clip Studio Paint
  • Dimensions: 2500 Ã— 3500 px

Skybound Vessel

Steampunk vehicle design combining Victorian aesthetics with fantastical engineering. The concept explores brass mechanics, steam propulsion, and ornate decorative elements.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Photoshop / KeyShot
  • Dimensions: 3500 Ã— 2000 px

Abyssal Sanctuary

An underwater environment concept featuring sunken ruins and bioluminescent marine life. This piece explores underwater lighting effects and the interplay between nature and ancient architecture.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Photoshop / ZBrush
  • Dimensions: 4000 Ã— 2667 px

Orbital Haven

Interior design concept for a futuristic space station focusing on functional aesthetics and advanced technology integration. The design emphasizes clean lines and atmospheric mood lighting.

  • Year: 2025
  • Tools: Blender / Substance Painter
  • Dimensions: 3840 Ã— 2160 px

Market Day

Historical environment concept depicting a bustling medieval marketplace. This piece focuses on period-accurate architecture, atmospheric perspective, and storytelling through environmental details.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Photoshop / 3ds Max
  • Dimensions: 3200 Ã— 2400 px

Xenomorph Study

Creature design exploration featuring alien anatomy and biomechanical elements. The concept investigates non-terrestrial evolution and unique structural adaptations for an extraterrestrial environment.

  • Year: 2025
  • Tools: ZBrush / Procreate
  • Dimensions: 2800 Ã— 4000 px

Wasteland Runner

Vehicle concept for a post-apocalyptic setting emphasizing improvised construction and weathered materials. The design showcases survival engineering and adaptive modifications for harsh environments.

  • Year: 2024
  • Tools: Photoshop / Maya
  • Dimensions: 4000 Ã— 2000 px

Arcane Library

Interior environment concept for a magical academy library featuring floating tomes and enchanted architectural elements. The design explores the intersection of classical library design with fantastical magical elements.

  • Year: 2025
  • Tools: Photoshop / Procreate
  • Dimensions: 3600 Ã— 2400 px

Get In Touch

Email: katelyn@katelynlydia.com

Instagram ArtStation YouTube

© 2025 Katelyn Lydia. All rights reserved.
